version_description:
We're excited to release this version 1.3 of the Bang & Olufsen app. In this release, we've enhanced configuration for the stunning BeoLab 50 and BeoLab 90 speakers, so you can quickly access pre-sets and volume control from a dedicated screen.
<

We're excited to release this version 1.3 of the Bang & Olufsen app. In this release, we've enhanced configuration for the stunning BeoLab 50 and BeoLab 90 speakers, so you can quickly access pre-sets and volume control from a dedicated screen.
<

In this release a lot has been done under-the-hood to improve the app’s performance and usability. We’ve tweaked the set-up flow to make it easier to add products. We’ve added free text filtering to your music’s favourites list, so those with big collecti

In this release, we’ve made it possible to rearrange your products on the Home screen. To reorder, go to the Your Products, which can be found in the Settings menu. Simply click edit, then drag and drop the listed products into the order preferred. This o

In this release, we bring ToneTouch to the controller screen for Beoplay M3 and Beoplay M5. You can access ToneTouch through clicking on the product tile. ToneTouch lets you change sound settings in a way which is intuitive and fun.
All our updates in
This version fixes an issue where the app would sometimes display "no products" even if products were present.
This version fixes an issue where the app would sometimes display "no products" even if products were present.
Fixed white screen on login with older iOS devices
Fix for video on login screen not working on older iOS devices

We take your privacy seriously at Bang & Olufsen, and that’s the focus of this release. We’ve included our Terms of Service and Privacy Policy, which have been updated in keeping with recent changes in EU law. You’ll need to accept these to continue u

We take your privacy seriously at Bang & Olufsen, and that’s the focus of this release. We’ve included our Terms of Service and Privacy Policy, which have been updated in keeping with recent changes in EU law. You’ll need to accept these to continue u

This update makes changes to product set-up and introduces a fresher and more accessible design. There are bigger product images in the home screen, bigger text size and navigation labels and a new app icon. We’ve also introduced a product selector to set

This update makes changes to product set-up and introduces a fresher and more accessible design. There are bigger product images in the home screen, bigger text size and navigation labels and a new app icon. We’ve also introduced a product selector to set

In this release, we improve how problems are handled when setting up products. We also introduce a new product controller page design, functional animations and tweak the layout of settings. iPad users will now see a new split-screen view.

All our

This update supports:
•Setup of Google Voice Assistant (GVA) for Beosound 1 & 2
•Color picker for Beosound 1 & 2, Beoplay A9 and Beovision Eclipse
•The opportunity of choosing position of Beosound 1 & 2 and Beoplay A9
•Better TV co

Bang & Olufsen app v. 2.0: Welcome to Beoplay products

We are happy to welcome all Beoplay products into the Bang & Olufsen app and pleased to provide Beoplay customers with the same app experience as the rest of our customers.
All Beop

We are pleased to welcome Beovision Harmony into the app. The in-app features for Beovision Harmony includes the remote area of the app, which consists of four control cards, you can swipe between in order to operate your Beovision Harmony. Furthermore, w

We appreciate all your feedback and in this release, we have included:
Option for initiating pairing of Beoremote One and Essence via app

Updated design for basic player controls (volume, play/pause, next/previous)
Updated design for music

We appreciate all your feedback and in this release, we have included:
Toggle for disabling proximity sensor for H8i and H9i
Option for initiating pairing of Beoremote One and Essence via app
Updated design for basic player controls (volume, play

We are happy to welcome all Beoplay products into the Bang & Olufsen app and pleased to provide Beoplay customers with the same app experience as the rest of our customers. The features included here for Beoplay products are similar to the ones found

We introduce Beosound Edge in the app
The app now guides you through the assemply and placement of your Beosound Edge. We have also included side selection for Edge, where you by one touch can change between the speakers that should play: left, right o

The foci of the release are stability, bug fixing and alignment, giving a better overall experience when using the app. One of the more notable improvements in this release is the design update of the

You spoke, we listened – this release therefore includes:
•Saving own Tone Touch adjustments as Listening Modes
•Select and deselect a Listening Mode by tapping on it
•Volume control for Bluetooth products
•S3 as part of the app
•Multi-user

We read all your feedback and in this release we have fixed the ToneTouch lack and we drastically improved the play queue performance causing hangs in some cases.
The fastest way to get improvements is to send us feedback via the app. Go to the Support

This update focus on general improvements and bug fixes.
As always, the fastest way to improvements is to send us feedback via the app. Go to the Support page in Settings (the small gears) and tell us what you have in mind.

In this update we have improved Bluetooth performance. This means that for Bluetooth products you will experience better and faster connection. It also includes the opportunity of having two Bluetooth products connected to the app at the same time.
As

In this update we have improved Bluetooth performance. This means that for Bluetooth products you will experience better and faster connection. It also includes the opportunity of having two Bluetooth products connected to the app at the same time.
As

This release solves the Bluetooth connectivity issues some of you faced after the latest app release. It also introduces a new design for our sign-up page and a new loading spinner.
